successes.title: FLUX All-in-One 3D Printer - UNLIMITED. ELEGANT. SIMPLE.
successes.description: Bring your imagination to life with FLUX’s 3D printing, 3D scanning, laser engraving and more modular functions.

Pledges.description:
[ THANKS / UPDATE ]
Thank you for your support! We will keep you posted with our latest news. In addition, we will include your name in the “thank you” list on our website.
[ WOODEN BOX ] Thank you for your support! To show our gratitude, we will ship you a wooden box laser-engraved with the beautiful FLUX logo and your customized characters. Shipping included.
[ FLUX T-SHIRT ] Thank you for your support! We will ship you an awesome FLUX T-shirt with our beautiful FLUX logo. Shipping included.
[ FLUX REPLICA ] A mini metal replica (non-printing) of the FLUX 3D printer (1:3.5 ratio) with moving parts and all details included. Shipping included.

[ EARLY BIRD ] Choose this option for THE BEST deal!  A complete FLUX kit with a roll of 500g material (PLA). (You can add $80 for a laser engraving module with laser safety glasses.) Shipping not included.

[ EARLY BIRD ] Choose this option for THE SECOND BEST deal!  A complete FLUX kit with a roll of 500g material (PLA). (You can add $80 for a laser engraving module with laser safety glasses.) Shipping not included.
[ CLASSIC VERSION] A complete FLUX kit with a roll of 500g material (PLA). Shipping not included.
[ CLASSIC VERSION] [ 2nd Batch ] A complete FLUX kit with a roll of 500g material (PLA). Shipping not included.

[ DELUXE VERSION ] A complete FLUX kit with 2 rolls of 500g material (PLA), and a laser engraving module with laser safety glasses.
Shipping not included.
[ DELUXE VERSION ] [ 2nd Batch ] A complete FLUX kit with 2 rolls of 500g material (PLA), and a laser engraving module with laser safety glasses. Shipping not included.

[ FIRST BATCH ] A complete FLUX kit with 2 rolls of material (PLA), and a laser engraving module with laser safety glasses.
(By pledging this, you will receive the FLUX kit before all other pledge levels. Become a beta adopter and own one of the limited kits with an unique serial number.)
Shipping not included.

[ METAL VERSION ] A premium METAL FLUX kit engraved with customized characters, 3 rolls of material (PLA), and a laser engraving module with laser safety glasses. It will come with an unique serial number.
Shipping included.

[ FLUX & YOU ] Share ideas and explore the possibility of collaboration over a meal with the FLUX team! You will also receive all the rewards of METAL VERSION, including: a premium METAL FLUX kit engraved with customized characters, 3 rolls of material (PLA), and a laser engraving module with laser safety glasses. It will come with an unique serial number. Shipping included. Costs of transportation not included.
